Kudzai Chimbaira (13 Ọktoba 1985 - Jenụwarị 2018) bụ onye Sweden-Zimbabwean na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi.

O mere nke mbụ ya n'afọ 2005 na obere ihe nkiri Pamvura, n'afọ 2007 ọ natara ihe nrite na Zimbabwe International Film Festival maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na obere ihe nkiri maka ime ka onye isi na ihe nkiri The Return
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ nwetakwara Zimbabwe's National Arts Merit Awards maka ọrụ ya na egwuregwu Anatol

N'afọ 2008, ọ duziri ihe nkiri Silent Words maka Harare International Festival of the Arts, n'otu afọ ahụ, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Carthage International Film Festival maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Zimbabwe N'afọ 2008, ọ kwagara Sweden.

Na Sweden, ọ malitere ụlọ ihe nkiri Integrationsteatern ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmemme ihe nkiri Cinemafrica, onye isi oche nke atụmatụ dị iche iche Tryck, ma mee ọtụtụ egwuregwu, na ihe nkiri Medan vi lever
Chimbaira nwụrụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2018, ọ dị afọ iri atọ na abụọ.
